title: Local Filesystem Links
name: alien-local-filesystem-links
description: Scans pages for file:/// links and makes it possible to open them with the system's file browser.
author: austrALIENsun

scripts.dev:FF: npm run clean && cross-env BROWSER=Firefox NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server --inline --hot --content-base=dist/
scripts.dev: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server --inline --hot --content-base=dist/
scripts.build: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --progress --hide-modules
scripts.build:FF: npm run clean && cross-env BROWSER=Firefox NODE_ENV=production webpack --progress --hide-modules

preferences.name: whitelist
preferences.title: Enable file link addon for whitelisted URLs
preferences.description: Any URL that's in the whitelist will enable local file links if you're browsing to that address. Empty or * will enable all. Multiple URLs are space separated. Wildcards are allowed e.g. *.trello.com

preferences.name: enableExecutables
preferences.title: Enable links to local executable files
preferences.description: If enabled any progam file can be launched by the addon. (Attention! A malicious site could use this for denial-of-service attack!)

preferences.name: enableLinkIcons
preferences.title: Enable link icons
preferences.description: If checked there will be a link added to every local link

preferences.name: revealOpenOption
preferences.title: Default link text click behaviour
preferences.description: Changes the default click behaviour of file-links. Default = direct file link open.
